title: Hunting Britain’s Nazis
itunes:title: Hunting Britain’s Nazis
itunes:subtitle: Journalist and author Robert Hutton talks about his new book Agent Jack, which describes the activities of Nazi sympathisers in Britain during World War Two and reveals the brilliant methods MI5 used to subvert them.
description:
Journalist and author Robert Hutton talks about his new book Agent Jack, which describes the activities of Nazi sympathisers in Britain during World War Two and reveals the brilliant methods MI5 used to subvert them.

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
